strings:
Fight with Geyzer in Memoriam,
otherwise known as Old Faithful?

Fight with the Tortured Soul in Memoriam,
otherwise known as the Still-Tortured Soul?
Fight with the Trap Box in Memoriam, otherwise known as the Trapped<->in<->the<->past Box?

Fight with Don Mole in Memoriam,
otherwise known as Dug-up Don Mole?

Fight with the Argon Lizard in Memoriam,
otherwise known as the Argone<->and<->come<->back Lizard?

Fight with Captain Crow in Memoriam,
otherwise known as Captain Crow<->come<->you're<->still<->alive?

Fight with Gemon in Memoriam,
otherwise known as Gemon<->I<->already<->defeated<->you<->didn't<->I?

Fight with Sir Leopold in Memoriam,
otherwise known as Still Sir<->Leopolding<->on?

Fight with the Dark Servant in Memoriam,
otherwise known as the Seriously Unstoppable Servant of Darkness?

Fight with Ruin in Memoriam,
otherwise known as Really<->Ruin<->the<->day<->I<->ever<->met<->you?

Fight with Evil Jessica in Memoriam,
otherwise known as Jessi<->can't<->we<->be<->friends<->now?

Fight with Marcello in Memoriam,
otherwise known as...Marc-hello-again?

Fight with Dhoulmagus in Memoriam,
otherwise known as Still<->dhouling<->out<->mager<->damage?

Fight with Dhoulmagus in Memoriam,
otherwise known as Still<->dhouling<->out<->mager<->damage?
Fight with Estark, Lord of the Underworld?

<center>This is Memories Lane, where those
<center>once slain linger as souvenirs of the mind,
<center>begging to be laid to rest once more.
<center>Come, hone your skills. Test your mettle.
*DUMMY<:> HINT MESSAGE 2*
*DUMMY<:> HINT MESSAGE 3*

<center>As you stroll down Memories Lane,
<center>Facing monster memories slain,
<center>May this tablet ease the pain,
<center>Restoring you to health again.
*DUMMY<:> HINT MESSAGE 5*
*DUMMY<:> HINT MESSAGE 6*
*DUMMY<:> HINT MESSAGE 7*

<center>As you stroll down Memories Lane,
<center>Facing monster memories slain,
<center>May this tablet ease the pain,
<center>Restoring you to health again.
*DUMMY<:> HINT MESSAGE 9*
*DUMMY<:> HINT MESSAGE 10*
*DUMMY<:> HINT MESSAGE 11*

<center>As you stroll down Memories Lane,
<center>Facing monster memories slain,
<center>May this tablet ease the pain,
<center>Restoring you to health again.
*DUMMY<:> HINT MESSAGE 13*
*DUMMY<:> HINT MESSAGE 14*

<center>The final test lies here ahead,
<center>None can fight now in your stead,
<center>But the mighty dragon keeps you fed,
<center>That with strength and courage you may tread.
The party's HP and MP are fully restored!

From the far side of the doors, you feel an
overwhelming presence, unlike anything
you've felt before.
Proceed?

<center>Memories are never truly slain,
<center>They live and breathe again and again,
<center>But not all foes lie in sight plain,
<center>Feel their presence, if strength you would gain.
